title: API with Nodejs, uzlist.com
description:
Built with NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and Redis. This project was developed for a existing website to support mobile apps with server API.

All CRUD functions are handled in Nodejs, all api route are handled in ExpressJS (node module). Database is implemented in MongoDB, NoSQL database.

API functionalities:

  • Create, update, and delete ads
  • Retrieve data with search query
  • Send private message to user
  • Upload images
  • Retrieve, change lost password

Usage (sample account):

Username: sardor@yahoo.uz
Password: 12345
